item.title: Gold Prices Surge To New Record High, Inch Closer To $4,000: Expert Warns It’s A Sign Of Equity Bust Worse Than Dotcom Bubble
item.description: Spot gold prices climbed to a new high of $3,970 per troy ounce, surging by more than 2.1% before paring some of the gains.
